# Self-supervised task for time series understanding

Self-supervised task for time series understanding: train a network to predict the ordinality of eac...: Self-supervised task for time series understanding: train a network to predict the ordinality of each bin of a scrambled time-series. The metric can be something as simple as cross-entropy loss or more informed like something related to information.
